titles.title: National Flood Insurance Program Reauthorization Act of 2017
National Flood Insurance Program Reauthorization Act of 2017
A bill to reauthorize the National Flood Insurance Program, and for other purposes.
National Flood Insurance Program Reauthorization Act of 2017

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs.

committee.name: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs
